snippet.title: Guts and Glory Announcement Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Check out http://www.hakjak.com for more info.

NOW ON STEAM CONCEPTS: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=674500565

Announcing Guts and Glory!  Ordinary people competing in extraordinary challenges of life and death.  Race to the finish line while everything tries to kill you.  Dodge spinning saw blades, deadly spikes, explosives, turrets, and a growing list of other hazards—while navigating insane tracks set in a wide variety of environments.  A game full of LOLs and WTFs and OMGs, where failing can be just as much fun as winning.

If you like games such as Happy Wheels, Turbo Dismount, Trails Fusion, or BeamNG, then you’ll love this one!

Music: “Unstoppable” by Ross Bugden (2014, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WuLsHkl_Xuk)

Please share this video and help make this project a success so I can make it bigger and better!!
